object.name: ChatAdministratorRights
object.description: Represents the rights of an administrator in a chat.
object.html_description: Represents the rights of an administrator in a chat.
object.rst_description: Represents the rights of an administrator in a chat.

annotations.description: True, if the user's presence in the chat is hidden
annotations.html_description: True, if the user's presence in the chat is hidden
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user's presence in the chat is hidden
annotations.name: is_anonymous

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can access the chat event log, get boost list, see hidden supergroup and channel members, report spam messages and ignore slow mode. Implied by any other administrator privilege.
annotations.html_description: True, if the administrator can access the chat event log, get boost list, see hidden supergroup and channel members, report spam messages and ignore slow mode. Implied by any other administrator privilege.
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the administrator can access the chat event log, get boost list, see hidden supergroup and channel members, report spam messages and ignore slow mode. Implied by any other administrator privilege.
annotations.name: can_manage_chat

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can delete messages of other users
annotations.html_description: True, if the administrator can delete messages of other users
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the administrator can delete messages of other users
annotations.name: can_delete_messages

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can manage video chats
annotations.html_description: True, if the administrator can manage video chats
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the administrator can manage video chats
annotations.name: can_manage_video_chats

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can restrict, ban or unban chat members, or access supergroup statistics
annotations.html_description: True, if the administrator can restrict, ban or unban chat members, or access supergroup statistics
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the administrator can restrict, ban or unban chat members, or access supergroup statistics
annotations.name: can_restrict_members

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can add new administrators with a subset of their own privileges or demote administrators that they have promoted, directly or indirectly (promoted by administrators that were appointed by the user)
annotations.html_description: True, if the administrator can add new administrators with a subset of their own privileges or demote administrators that they have promoted, directly or indirectly (promoted by administrators that were appointed by the user)
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the administrator can add new administrators with a subset of their own privileges or demote administrators that they have promoted, directly or indirectly (promoted by administrators that were appointed by the user)
annotations.name: can_promote_members

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings
annotations.name: can_change_info

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to invite new users to the chat
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is allowed to invite new users to the chat
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to invite new users to the chat
annotations.name: can_invite_users

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can post stories to the chat
annotations.html_description: True, if the administrator can post stories to the chat
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the administrator can post stories to the chat
annotations.name: can_post_stories

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can edit stories posted by other users, post stories to the chat page, pin chat stories, and access the chat's story archive
annotations.html_description: True, if the administrator can edit stories posted by other users, post stories to the chat page, pin chat stories, and access the chat's story archive
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the administrator can edit stories posted by other users, post stories to the chat page, pin chat stories, and access the chat's story archive
annotations.name: can_edit_stories

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can delete stories posted by other users
annotations.html_description: True, if the administrator can delete stories posted by other users
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the administrator can delete stories posted by other users
annotations.name: can_delete_stories

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can post messages in the channel, or access channel statistics; for channels only
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the administrator can post messages in the channel, or access channel statistics; for channels only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the administrator can post messages in the channel, or access channel statistics; for channels only
annotations.name: can_post_messages

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can edit messages of other users and can pin messages; for channels only
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the administrator can edit messages of other users and can pin messages; for channels only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the administrator can edit messages of other users and can pin messages; for channels only
annotations.name: can_edit_messages

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to pin messages; for groups and supergroups only
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to pin messages; for groups and supergroups only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to pin messages; for groups and supergroups only
annotations.name: can_pin_messages

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to create, rename, close, and reopen forum topics; for supergroups only
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to create, rename, close, and reopen forum topics; for supergroups only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to create, rename, close, and reopen forum topics; for supergroups only
annotations.name: can_manage_topics
